findings.title: SKILL DISCOVERY ABUSE detected by YARA
findings.description: Detects manipulation of skill discovery to increase unwanted activation: Perfect
findings.snippet: GitClassic is a read-only GitHub interface that's pure server-rendered HTML — no JavaScript, no bloat, instant loads. Perfect for AI agents that need to browse repos without dealing with GitHub's heavy client-side rendering.
findings.remediation: Review and remove skill discovery abuse pattern
